title: Wife, I Am the Baby’s Father - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Historical   Josei   Martial Arts   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Alternate World   Amnesia   Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Misunderstandings   Pregnancy
author: Lian Qing   涟情
description:
Overnight, her parents committed suicide.

And she married her nemesis.

Without resentment, not unwilling.

She became his wife.

But on the night she became his woman, a fight broke out, her life changed in one night.

Really want to know, whether or not she and him can still be together.>
